description: This file contains unit tests for the apiClient module, verifying environment variable handling, fetch API interactions, and error cases.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up timers and mocks the fetch global before each test.

methods.name: afterEach
methods.description: Clears timers, restores real timers, and resets global.fetch and environment variables after each test.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for apiClient.
